segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, and it’s almost funny how oblivious she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just gushing out, and she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, climbing up that stool like it’s nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is just waiting for her turn, not even realizing how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside is so calm, it’s like a joke compared to the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever turn around and see what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just going to keep flowing, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how relaxed everyone is in this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really pushing his luck with that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this is one of those moments where everything is about to go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone steps in before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
